name: Vic Toria
description:
Vic Toria is a RPG about Arael, a college freshman with a unique ability- she can freely move between the spirit world and the material world using mirrors. It's a day like any other, until someone appears in the spirit world who shouldn't be there.

A RPG Maker game created in 48 hours for the 2022 Global Game Jam. This is my first time both making a game in RPG Maker MV and publishing a game, so comments are greatly appreciated! 

Tips: 
-Explore everything
-The cat is your friend
